title: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil (1997) (Kevin Spacey)
description:
MIDNIGHT IN THE GARDEN OF GOOD AND EVIL - 1997

IMDb Rating: 6.4 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0119668/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0119668/</a>

  This is a truer-than-it-is-fictional re-telling of the version of events told of in John Berendt&#039;s ultra-best selling novel about the people and places surrounding a real homicide that took place in Savannah, Georgia in the 1980&#039;s.
  Midnight In The Garden of Good and Evil introduces viewers to a sophisticated and quietly gay antiques dealer (Kevin Spacey) who either murdered a notorious local hustler (a young Jude Law) or killed him in self defense. There&#039;s also a voodoo priestess, a world-famous bulldog, an eccentric inventor who just might possess a substance that could poison the population of a mid-sized city, a colorful old school lawyer, a flamboyant drag queen, a visiting investigative reporter who knows a good story when he sees one, and added into the mix is the sun-bathed culture and vitality of Savannah itself.

  Starring: Kevin Spacey, John Cusack, Jack Thompson, Allison Eastwood, Irma P. Hall, Jude Law.

  Directed by: Clint Eastwood.
